info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:48PM EDT until July 20 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR MACOMB COUNTY... At 347 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Armada to near Sterling Heights to near Detroit Zoo, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... St. Clair Shores, Richmond and Memphis around 355 PM EDT. Grosse Pointe around 405 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Fraser, Eastpointe, Washington, New Haven, Center Line and Chesterfield Township. People attending Fraser Lions Club Carnival , and Jimmy Johns Field should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
